#summary This page collects together the keyboard shortcuts in Hotwire.

= Keyboard Shortcuts =

== Interacting with commands and output buffers ==

|| *Shortcut*   || *Action* ||
|| Ctrl-Shift-C || Kill the currently running command. ||
|| Ctrl-Shift-K || Remove Pipeline - this deletes the currently selected buffer ||

== Tabs and terminal windows ==

|| *Shortcut*   || *Action* ||
|| Ctrl-T       || Create new hotwire tab ||
|| Ctrl-Shift-T || Create new terminal tab ||

== Copy, Paste etc ==

These use the standard keyboard shortcuts - Ctrl-C, Ctrl-V etc
